song.title: Flight (Sleepy Mix)
song.info:
??/??/91 [04:13] Released on "Infinite Dreams" (musicdisk) by Lunatics. A remix of "Flight", which I made due to dissatisfaction with the way the original turned out. A fair bit faster than its parent, this one works better IMHO. No major sample changes, it's just quicker, and the chord sequences more layered.
<SMPL000> : written + mixed by <SMPL001> : subculture <SMPL002> : --------------------- <SMPL003> : a faster, more upbeat <SMPL004> : mix than before. <SMPL005> : there is no sleep <SMPL006> : until heaven...
